bug.author: thjashin
bug.summary: prettytensor's unimplemented he_init() for conv2d causes forward propagation exploding
bug.description:
Current solution: When using conv2d, apply a patch to <denchmark-code>.../python2.7/dist-packages/prettytensor/pretty_tensor_image_methods.py </denchmark-code>
# init = layers.he_init(size[2] * patch_size, size[3] * patch_size, # activation_fn) init = layers.xavier_init(size[2] * patch_size, size[3] * patch_size) This issue will be solved in future after we have our own neural layers and get rid of prettytensor.

comments.comment: Fixed for new examples in master because we use Tensorflow contrib layers now.
